com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface Path

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Curve, Geometry
All Known Subinterfaces:
Ring
All Known Implementing Classes:
BasePath, BaseRing
public interface Path
extends Curve

Implements a Path that consists of one or more points that represent a collection of straight-line segments.

See Also:
Point, Ring

Determines if any segment of the path intersects with another segment.

a boolean value - True, if there is an intersection, else False

                              double y1,
                              double x2,
                              double y2)
Determines if the given line intersects a Path.

Parameters:
x1 - X ordinate of the first point
y1 - Y ordinate of the first point

y2 - Y ordinate of the second point
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if there is an intersection, else False

pathRelatePath

public int pathRelatePath(Path path)
Determines the given path's relationship to another path.

Parameters:
path - the path
Returns:
one of the following relationship values:
ClementiniGeometry.CROSS,
ClementiniGeometry.TOUCH,
ClementiniGeometry.DISJOINT,
ClementiniGeometry.EQUAL,
ClementiniGeometry.OVERLAP,
ClementiniGeometry.CONTAIN,
ClementiniGeometry.INSIDE

path - the path
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if disjoint, else False

Returns:

clem_touchPoint

public boolean clem_touchPoint(double px,
                               double py)
Determines if a point "touches" a path/ring. A point can touch a path at its two endpoints. A point can touch a ring anywhere along its boundary

Parameters:
px - the X ordinate
py - the Y ordinate
Returns:
a boolean value -True if the point touches the path/ring, else False

                                 double py)
Determines if the given Point is on the Path (or inside the ring).

Parameters:
px - the X ordinate
py - the Y ordinate
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if the point is on the path (or inside the ring), else False

Determines if the paths/ring boundaries cross.

Parameters:
path - the path
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if the path boundaries cross, else False

pathDisjointLine

public boolean pathDisjointLine(double x1,
                                double y1,
                                double x2,
                                double y2)
Determines if the given line is disjoint from the path or (ring boundary).

Parameters:
x1 - the X ordinate of the first point
y1 - the Y ordinate of the first point
x2 - the X ordinate of the second point
y2 - the Y ordinate of the second point
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if the path is disjoint, else False

distanceSqToEnvelope

public double distanceSqToEnvelope(Envelope envelope)
Calculates the shortest distance squared from a Path to an Envelope. If the path is within the envelope, the distance is 0.0

Parameters:
envelope - the envelope
Returns:
the distance squared

clip

public void clip(Envelope envelope,
                 ArrayList paths)
Clips the given path into multiple paths.

Parameters:
envelope - the clipping envelope
paths - an existing array of multiple paths
